entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as having a surly voice and being part of the Quidditch team.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as trying to defend Ginny and being in the Gryffindor common room with Harry.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as being part of the Quidditch team and getting emotional during practice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having a pile of homework and struggling with a star chart for Astronomy.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as turning up to the Gryffindor common room and making fun of Ron and Ginny's Quidditch skills.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as sitting down next to Harry and defending Ginny's Quidditch skills.

entities.name: astronomy
entities.description: Astronomy is mentioned as a subject that Harry is struggling with.

relationships.description: Fred teases Ron about his Quidditch skills.
Fred and George team up to watch Ron and Ginny's practice.
